properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
CAPE VERDE TO MARTINIQUE.
DNC 01, DNC 14.
20 METER S/V HEROICA CINCO, BLUE HULL, TWO
PERSONS ON BOARD, OVERDUE MINDELO (16-53N 024-59W)
TO MARTINIQUE (14-39N 061-01W). VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
